item.title: 拜登将在 "钢铁之城 "匹兹堡呼吁对中国金属征收更高的关税
item.description: 美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）将于周三呼吁大幅提高对中国金属产品的关税，作为旨在讨好摇摆州宾夕法尼亚州钢铁工人的一揽子政策的一部分，但这有可能激怒中国政府。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden will call on Wednesday for sharply higher tariffs on Chinese metal products as part of a package of policies aimed at pleasing steelworkers in the swing state of Pennsylvania, at the risk of angering Beijing.】

item.title: 苹果供应商富士康引入轮值首席执行官制度
item.description: 台湾富士康董事长刘永好周三表示，富士康本月开始实行轮值首席执行官制度，对管理层进行全面改革，旨在培养全球最大合约电子制造商的接班人。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn has this month started a rotating chief executive system in an overhaul of its management designed to nurture successors of the world's largest contract electronics maker, chairman Young Liu said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国一汽汽车金融部门推出免首付贷款
item.description: 中国国有汽车制造商一汽集团的汽车金融部门推出了一项免首付贷款计划，成为取消政府规定的最低还款额后首批采取这一举措的供应商之一。【原文：The auto finance arm of China's state-owned automaker FAW Group has launched a loan programme with no down payment, becoming one of the first providers to make such a move since the removal of government-set minimum payments.】

item.title: 大众将与新鹏合作推出新架构，以降低中国电动汽车成本
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）周三表示，它已与中国合作伙伴新鹏汽车公司（Xpeng）合作开发了一种新的智能电动汽车架构，这家德国汽车制造商称，这将有助于它在其最大的市场上提供价格更低廉的电动汽车。【原文：Volkswagen AG said on Wednesday it has developed a new architecture for intelligent and electric cars with its Chinese partner Xpeng , which the German automaker said will help it offer more affordable EVs in its biggest market.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚迪斯尼乐园扩建计划通过重大障碍审核
item.description: 周三，迪斯尼乐园度假区的扩建计划扫清了一大障碍，当地官员通过了一份新的蓝图，该蓝图将指导华特-迪斯尼在未来 40 年内在南加州主题公园的发展。【原文：Plans to expand the Disneyland Resort cleared a major hurdle Wednesday, as local officials endorsed a new blueprint governing the development of Walt Disney's Southern California theme parks over the next 40 years.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯业绩大涨，强劲势头助力第一季度业绩超预期，并引发业绩展望上调
item.description: 德国体育用品巨头阿迪达斯周二公布了好于预期的业绩，并上调了 2024 年的业绩指导，势头强劲，阿迪达斯股价周三上涨超过 7%，创下两年多来的最高水平。【原文：Shares in Adidas rose more than 7% on Wednesday, hitting their highest level in over two years after the German sportswear giant on Tuesday reported better-than-expected results and raised its 2024 guidance on stronger momentum.】

item.title: 对中国的担忧加剧，日本公司再次向美国施压
item.description: 由于担心中国的需求和中国政府对供应链的影响，日本公司正越来越多地将其增长计划转向美国，这促使日本公司明显转向世界最大的经济体。【原文：Japanese companies are increasingly hitching their growth plans to the United States, as concerns about Chinese demand and Beijing's influence over supply chains prompt a noticeable pivot toward the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 第一生命首席执行官预计主动收购在日本将成为惯例
item.description: 日本第一生命公司首席执行官在以出人意料的出价成功达成 20 亿美元收购一家公司的交易后表示，随着时间的推移，主动收购在日本将变得很普遍，因为政府正在努力消除这种做法的污名化。【原文：Unsolicited takeovers will become common in Japan with time due to government efforts to de-stigmatise the practice, Dai-ichi Life's CEO said after its success in clinching a $2 billion deal to acquire a company with an unexpected bid.】

item.title: G20 监管机构称 "非银行 "应持有更多现金以应对保证金飙升
item.description: 二十国集团（G20）金融监管机构周三提议，保险公司、对冲基金、家族办公室和大宗商品交易商等 "非银行 "应持有足够的现金，并制定应急计划，以应对用于支持衍生品头寸以防违约的抵押品激增的情况。【原文："Non-banks" such as insurers, hedge funds, family offices and commodities traders should hold sufficient cash and draw up contingency plans for coping with spikes in collateral used to back derivatives positions against default, the G20's financial watchdog proposed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：中国万科寻求出售物流运营商普洛斯股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，中国万科正在寻求出售其持有的物流公司普洛斯的全部股份，这家资金紧张的国有房地产开发商正寻求筹集流动资金。【原文：China Vanke is seeking to sell its entire stake in logistics firm GLP, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, as the cash-strapped state-backed property developer looks to raise liquidity.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汇丰将在亚洲再裁减 20 个投资银行职位
item.description: 三位知情人士称，由于交易低迷，汇丰预计将在亚洲再裁减 20 个投资银行职位，本周裁员总数将达到 30 人左右。【原文：HSBC is expected to cut an additional 20 investment banking jobs in Asia on a deals slump, takes the total cuts to around 30 this week, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 奢侈品巨头 LVMH 第一季度销售额令人放心，股价上涨
item.description: 全球最大奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）第一季度的销售数据为担心行业前景（尤其是中国市场）的投资者吃了一颗定心丸，该集团股价周三上涨。【原文：LVMH shares rose on Wednesday, after the first quarter sales figures from the world's largest luxury group offered an element of reassurance to investors concerned about the industry's outlook, particularly in China.】

item.title: 丰田召回普锐斯汽车，因门把手故障停止订单
item.description: 丰田汽车发言人周三表示，丰田汽车已暂停接受普锐斯（Prius）车型的订单，以解决因后门把手部件故障而导致的产品召回问题。【原文：Toyota Motor has suspended taking orders for its Prius model cars to address a product recall due to faults found on rear door handle parts, a spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国 3 月通胀率降至 3.2% 低于预期
item.description: 英国国家统计局（Office for National Statistics）周三表示，英国 3 月份消费者价格通胀率的年增长率从 2 月份的 3.4% 放缓至 3.2%，低于预期。【原文：British consumer price inflation slowed by less than expected to 3.2% in annual terms in March, down from a 3.4% increase in February, the Office for National Statistics said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 痛苦的高利率警钟威胁全球市场
item.description: 大型投资者警告说，对主要经济体利率将保持相对较高水平的担忧正在逐渐回升，并有可能给金融市场敲响痛苦的警钟。【原文：Fear that interest rates in major economies will stay relatively high is creeping back and threatens a painful wake-up call for financial markets, big investors warn.】

item.title: ASML 第一季度盈利 13 亿美元，新订单量低于预期
item.description: 电脑芯片制造商最大的设备供应商 ASML 周三公布，第一季度盈利 12.2 亿欧元（13.0 亿美元），新订单流入 36 亿欧元，低于预期。【原文：ASML , the largest supplier of equipment to computer chip makers, on Wednesday reported first-quarter earnings of 1.22 billion euros ($1.30 billion), and a worse-than-expected inflow of new bookings of 3.6 billion euros.】

item.title: GQG 和 Fidelity 购买印度沃达丰 Idea 价值 2.61 亿美元的股票
item.description: 印度沃达丰 Idea 公司表示，投资公司 GQG 和 Fidelity 购买了该公司价值 2.61 亿美元的股票，这是这家负债累累的电信运营商计划出售 21.6 亿美元股票的一部分。【原文：Investment firms GQG and Fidelity picked up shares worth $261 million in India's Vodafone Idea as part of the debt-saddled telecom operator's planned $2.16 billion share sale, the company said.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元多头进入中国市场
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 创始人称 Telegram 平台用户数量将在年内达到 10 亿
item.description: Telegram 消息应用程序是乌克兰和俄罗斯最受欢迎的社交媒体平台之一，其创始人在本周二发表的讲话中说，该应用程序的月活跃用户将有可能在一年内突破 10 亿。【原文：The Telegram messaging app, one of the most popular social media platforms in Ukraine and Russia, will likely cross 1 billion active monthly users within a year, its founder said in remarks published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官表示正在研究在印尼建立生产设施的可能性
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官周三在会见印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）后表示，苹果公司将研究在印尼建立生产设施的可能性。【原文：Apple Inc will look into the possibility of building a manufacturing facility in Indonesia, its CEO said on Wednesday after meeting President Joko Widodo.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪为其越野车方成宝系列推出三款新车型
item.description: 比亚迪发布了其高端品牌 "方成宝 "的三款新车型，其中包括两款概念车。【原文：BYD has unveiled three new models, including two concept cars, under its premium brand Fangchengbao as the Chinese electric vehicle giant ramps up efforts to sell into higher-priced segments.】

item.title: 澳大利亚莱因哈特公司入股林纳斯稀土公司，股价大涨
item.description: 澳大利亚首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）周二晚些时候提交的一份交易所文件显示，她已成为中国以外最大的稀土生产商林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）的主要股东。【原文：Australia's richest person, Gina Rinehart, become a substantial shareholder in Lynas Rare Earths, the largest producer of rare earths outside of China, an exchange filing showed late on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利将在亚太地区裁减约 50 个投资银行职位
item.description: 知情人士透露，由于交易不景气，摩根士丹利将在亚太地区裁减约 50 个投资银行职位。【原文：Morgan Stanley is cutting around 50 investment banking jobs in the Asia-Pacific region due to a deals slump, sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔重新考虑降息，亚洲股市涨跌不一，收益率跳涨
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市涨跌不一，因为世界上最强大的央行行长改变了对美国今年降息的看法，推动国债收益率创下五个月来的新高，美元对其他货币的汇率也高居不下。【原文：Asian shares were mixed on Wednesday as the world's most powerful central banker had a change of heart on U.S. rate cuts this year, pushing Treasury yields to new five-month highs and the dollar towering against other currencies.】

item.title: 美联储言论粉碎降息押注后美元持稳，日元脆弱
item.description: 在包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在内的美联储官员发表言论，暗示美国利率可能在更长时间内保持较高水平后，美元周三基本持稳，日元则继续在34年低点附近徘徊。【原文：The dollar was broadly steady on Wednesday, keeping the yen rooted near 34-year lows after comments from Federal Reserve officials, including Chair Jerome Powell, suggested U.S. interest rates are likely to stay higher for longer.】

item.title: 需求担忧超过中东供应担忧，油价下跌
item.description: 周三早盘，油价有所回落，原因是对中国经济增长势头疲软和美国短期内降息希望减弱所导致的全球需求的担忧超过了对中东紧张局势加剧所导致的供应担忧。【原文：Oil prices eased in early trade on Wednesday as worries about global demand due to weak economic momentum in China and fading hopes for U.S. interest rate cuts in the near term outweighed supply fears on heightened tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，越南为陷入巨额欺诈的银行提供 240 亿美元的 "史无前例 "救援
item.description: 根据三份银行文件和一位知情人士向路透社提供的最新官方信息，越南对陷入全国最大金融欺诈案的西贡股份商业银行（SCB）实施了 "史无前例 "的救援。【原文：Vietnam has mounted an "unprecedented" rescue of Saigon Joint Stock Commercial Bank (SCB), a lender engulfed in the nation’s biggest financial fraud, according to three bank documents and new official information provided to Reuters by a person with access to the documents.】

item.title: 日元疲软提振日本出口，但进口费用增加损害商业情绪
item.description: 受运往美国的汽车货运带动，日本 3 月份出口连续第四个月实现增长，但由于日元暴跌，大公司的商业信心有所减弱，这也预示着坚实的经济复苏尚需时日。【原文：Japan's exports grew for the fourth straight month in March driven by U.S.-bound car shipments, although business confidence at big firms soured amid a slump in the yen and signalled that a sure-footed economic recovery was some time away.】

item.title: 力拓高管表示，力拓的目标是将决议铜矿留在美国
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto）的一位高级管理人员周二表示，如果这个拖延已久且备受争议的项目获得监管部门批准，力拓的目标是将其决议矿的铜矿全部留在美国境内。【原文：Rio Tinto , aims to keep all of the copper from its Resolution mine inside the United States should the long-delayed and controversial project win regulatory approval, a senior executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，由于风险模型滞后，全球财产保险公司面临 "惊人 "损失
item.description: 凯捷咨询公司（Capgemini）周三发布的一份报告称，由于自然灾害增多，而风险模型未能跟上，2022 年全球财产险和意外险承保人出现了 "惊人 "的承保损失。【原文：Global property and casualty insurers showed "alarming" underwriting losses in 2022 as natural catastrophes increased and risk models failed to keep up, a report from consultants Capgemini said on Wednesday.】
